name: Birth to Death
description:
All the most meaningful parts of life are in your hands. Hygiene, sleeping, cleaning: All for suckers! Make fun decisions! Drive sweet cars, explore the town, hang out with people. Don’t worry about the lame stuff.




In this world, you make the rules. You can be whoever you want to be and form relationships with the people you like. Customize your character, your car, your home and more!




Cars! Mansions! Designer clothing! It can all be yours! Just make sure you land a sweet job.




Build relationships with people. Becomes friends… OR MORE! Maybe even have some kids.




Except maybe in-game death. Also, don’t get too creepy with your wild fantasies. Those won’t be in it.
